# SingleMatching { #matching.matchings.SingleMatching }

`matchings.SingleMatching(self, dictionary)`

Matching class for games with singular matches like SM or SR.

## Parameters

| Name         | Type   | Description                                                   | Default    |
|--------------|--------|---------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| `dictionary` |        | A dictionary comprised of ``Player, Optional[Player]`` pairs. | _required_ |
